item.title: Launching.io - New Tech Startups
item.description:
Launching.io - New Tech Startups

Launching.io is a new community for young tech startups. Founders and influencers submit new startups every day, and the community votes up the most promising ones. It's an easy way for early adopters to uncover the next breakout startup unicorns, and a simple approach for startups to attract their first visitors.

item.title: Jessica Livingston: Why Startups Need to Focus on Sales, Not Marketing
item.description:
Jessica Livingston: Why Startups Need to Focus on Sales, Not Marketing

JESSICA LIVINGSTON: The most important thing an early-stage startup should know about marketing is rather counterintuitive: that you probably shouldn't be doing anything you'd use the term "marketing" to describe. Sales and marketing are two ends of a continuum. At the sales end your outreach is narrow and deep.

item.title: SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.
item.description:
SumoMe, free tools to grow your website traffic.

Nov 3rd, 2015 by Nat Eliason Pop quiz: What do all of these sites' home pages have in common? Okay, I admit, the title of the article is kind of a giveaway. They're all using social proof to show you how big their reach is, immediately when you show up.

item.title: Accelerate Intrapreneurship: Beyond Innovation Theatre | Amsterdam
item.description:
Accelerate Intrapreneurship: Beyond Innovation Theatre | Amsterdam

Many corporates started experimenting with in-house labs, incubators and accelerators for accelerating innovation. However, most aren't delivering upon their promise (yet). This one-day event addresses questions like What are the enablers and success factors for intrapreneurship, from idea to venture? How to align intrapreneurship programs with the existing operations and current brand assets?

item.title: Clarity - On Demand Business Advice
item.description:
Clarity - On Demand Business Advice

Make faster & better decisions to grow your business. Clarity is your lifeline that instantly connects you with battle-tested advice from entrepreneurs. Find and schedule a call in minutes.

item.title: Your Best Year Ever: How To Drive 20,000 Visitors To Your Blog In 90 Days
item.description:
Your Best Year Ever: How To Drive 20,000 Visitors To Your Blog In 90 Days

Want to make this year your best ever? Make that commitment, follow the advice I'm about to share and it'll happen! Growing your blog traffic isn't rocket science. If it were that hard, then how do so many blogs generate 500,000 - 1,000,000 visitors per day?

item.title: Product Strategy for Start-ups
item.description:
Product Strategy for Start-ups

I'm speaking about product strategy in startup. That is a beautiful photo of this exact place. I did not realize I'd be standing in front of it twice, but there you go. I am Des Traynor, co-founder of Intercom.

item.title: How To Create A Useful Value Proposition w/ Examples
item.description:
How To Create A Useful Value Proposition w/ Examples

Value proposition is the #1 thing that determines whether people will bother reading more about your product or hit the back button. It's also the main thing you need to test - if you get it right, it will be a huge boost.
